name: Promise of Memory: Childhood
description:
This is a prototype that I made during my first year at university for a course. This prototype idea was later picked out as one of twelve games for our first Game Project course where we worked together in teams with other disciplines. 

The game idea itself is about two friends who meet in a dream - one loses its body and becomes a ghost. Use both characters to progress through the levels, don't be too slow or the nightmare will catch up to you.

Controls: Purple character W,A,S,D & Ghost I,J,K,L + space bar to make it follow the other character. 

Please not it is a simple prototype which purpose was to show of my idea, I have not balanced anything proper. I would like to remake a lot and create a full game with this idea - but probably rename it. The game created during the game project in school lost a bit of the original vision for the game. You can find that game on FB here https://www.facebook.com/promiseofmemory/.
